CustomField.description:
This is the household level Membership ID in the 16-Digit membership ID where ISO is the first 3, Club Code is the next 3 digits, Member ID (Household Membership ID) is the next 7 digits, Assoc Member Id is the next 2 digits and Check Digit is the last digit
In case of RAP its the ID on the membership.
Example: If the 16-Digit membership ID= 4382121353733023, then the Membership ID will be 2694719. This type of membership has no person account associated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This is the household level Membership ID in the 16-Digit membership ID where ISO is the first 3, Club Code is the next 3 digits, Member ID (Household Membership ID) is the next 7 digits, Assoc Member Id is the next 2 digits and Check Digit is the last digit
In case of RAP its the ID on the membership.
Example: If the 16-Digit membership ID= 4382121353733023, then the Membership ID will be 2694719. This type of membership has no person account associated.
CustomField.label: Membership ID
